topic.title: Decred (DCR) decentralized credits
topic.body:
To spread more awareness about this cryptocurrency i have copied some their clearnet pages over to ZeroNet.

Documentation
 
 http://127.0.0.1:43110/155FyjAitsvfvs9gC1sdC2gtHanB4JHju6/


Developer documentation

 http://127.0.0.1:43110/1QBvmpN9oTs1R2oTRrAfRxRrV1drFjyBi1/


DCRDEX - decentralized exchange

 http://127.0.0.1:43110/14vLHRPDjHTiWsu9JegPqQ6qfwcqNw5HfN/


DCR Comic

 http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PeNRrW6nkfCEjGF8H8NEb5ejKf3LrfuPG/


Links and resources

topic.title: getmonero.org mirror on IPFS
topic.body:
mirroring important content ( that could possibly be censored ) to distributed networks is fun, so i decided to copy the getmonero.org page to IPFS

https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTAHXhyptcjPavbU6gwkU3LS6Td9bS23Ggc3nW6YWrsvN

1604061320_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
+1

that's a good idea i have created a backup page on IPFS for the English version of zeronet.io

https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmX9dzGPn6Y4zyMKxuLarrJFEQct6cTkxUxbs7ZTLe9MNH

> [styromaniac](#comment_2627_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Did you use Httrack?

no manually copied and modified everything. Wasn't luckily that much. Started doing it a few days ago and completed it after seeing your post.
